original_text: One day he found a very valuable stone that someone wanted to sell. So he went away and he sold everything that he had. Then he went and he bought that very valuable stone.’
korean_text: 극히 값진 진주 하나를 발견하매 가서 자기의 소유를 다 팔아 그 진주를 사느니라

sentences.original_text: One day he found a very valuable stone
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날 그는 매우 귀한 보석을 발견했습니다

sentences.original_text: and he sold everything that he had
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신이 가진 모든 것을 팔았습니다

sentences.original_text: and he bought that very valuable stone
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 매우 귀한 보석을 샀습니다
